description.narrative: 1) Elevation of commercial real estate standards-throughout the country through development of a Class A office building; 2) Development of high quality business infrastructure in Armenia; 3) Direct and indirect employment of service jobs; possibility for further linkages; 4) Tax revenues will accrue to the government; 5) Implementation of green building standards and sound E&S policies as per IFC requirements

The proposed project will support an investment by Property Development Company CJSC (Prodeco) for the construction of a ~23,000sqm Class A, 9 storey energy efficient green office complex in central Yerevan. The project is a greenfield that will contribute a modern, green building to the existing business infrastructure of the country, providing an important model for future energy efficient construction projects in the country. The office complex will be constructed on a total land area of 2,850 sqm on V. Sargsyan street, with the main façade of the existing building remaining intact in the new construction. The property developer, Prodeco, owned 100% by Ameria Group, was established in 2007 and specializes in real estate development.

mailing-address.narrative: Mr. Artashes Kazakhetsyan Director, Property Development Company CJSC 9, G. Lusavorich str. Yerevan 0015 Republic of Armenia Phone: +374 10 56 1111 Fax: + 374 10 51 31 33 e-mail: mailto:artashes@ameria.am http://www.prodeco.am

Property Development Company CJSC 9, G. Lusavorich str. Yerevan 0015 Republic of Armenia Phone: +374 10 56 1111 Fax: + 374 10 51 31 33 e-mail: mailto:artashes@ameria.am http://www.prodeco.am Site location Bd. 2, V.Sargsyan 4, Yerevan 0010 Republic of Armenia http://www.prodeco.am

name.narrative: Project site is located in central Yerevan, within 100m from the main Republic Square of Yerevan, Armenia. The land location has large amount of pedestrian and land traffic being situated in one of the central streets of the city. Currently there are existing buildings in the site location, which will be demolished during the construction of the new building. Exact address for the site is as follows: Bd. 2, V.Sargsyan 4, Yerevan 0010 Republic of Armenia http://www.prodeco.am

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.
